name: SMS Acknowledgements
description: Simple START/STOP/DONE time and status updates via text message from crew members.

prd.problemStatement: Crew members need a frictionless way to update task status and time without requiring app login or complex interfaces.
userStories: As a crew member, I want to text START so that my time is tracked automatically
As a superintendent, I want real-time status updates so that I know work progress
